comment: Might have some potential but at 17 months in new charred barrels it is very young, and it tastes that way. Not much complexity. A hint of toffee on the nose. Some sweetness from the corn and wheat. Finishes with a strong alcohol note. It lacks balance. This just tastes too young.
Not a great experiment. So many negatives, I do not know where to begin. Grassy, young, strawlike. My husband thought it was awful and rough.
